  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_86135</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86135</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Distance de la terre du soleil et du Proxima centauri</string>
            <string language="en">Distance of Earth from the Sun and Proxima Centauri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand von Masse von der Sonne und vom Proxima 
centauri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distância da terra do sol e do Proxima centauri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distanza di terra dal sole e dal Proxima 
centauri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόσταση της γης από τον ήλιο και το Proxima 
centauri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Distancia de la tierra del sol y del Proxima 
centauri</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la distance de la terre par rapport au soleil et au Proxima centauri, les prochaines étoiles les plus proches de la Terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the distance of Earth from the Sun and from Proxima Centauri, the next nearest star to Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la distance</string>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Proxima centauri</string>
            <string language="en">Proxima Centauri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">star</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Abstand von Masse von 
der Sonne und von centauri Proxima, der folgende nächste Stern zur 
Masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a distância da terra do
sol e de Proxima centauri, a estrela a mais próxima seguinte à 
terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la distanza di terra 
dal sole e da Proxima centauri, la stella più vicina seguente a 
terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την απόσταση της γης από 
τον ήλιο και από Proxima centauri, το επόμενο κοντινότερο 
αστέρι στη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la distancia de la 
tierra del sol y de Proxima centauri, la estrella más cercana 
siguiente a la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Proxima Centauri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
